import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import logo from './logo.svg'; import './App.css'; import getCompanies from './api/getCompanies'; import { CompanyType } from './types'; function App() { const [companies, setCompanies] = useState([]) const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(0) const [companiesToDisplay, setCompaniesToDisplay] = useState([]) let pageCounts = Math.ceil(companies.length /10) const fetchCompanies = async() => { const comp: any = await getCompanies() setCompanies(comp) } const handlePageChange = (nextPage: number) => { setCurrentPage(nextPage) } useEffect(() => { fetchCompanies() }, []) useEffect(() => { console.log('companies::::::', companies); let comp = companiesToDisplay switch(currentPage) { case 1: comp = companies.slice(0,9) break; case 2: comp = companies.slice(10,19) break case 3: comp = companies.slice(20,29) break case 4: comp = companies.slice(30,39) break case 5: comp = companies.slice(40,49) break case 6: comp = companies.slice(50,59) break case 7: comp = companies.slice(60,69) break case 8: comp = companies.slice(70,79) break case 9: comp = companies.slice(80,89) break case 10: comp = companies.slice(90,99) break case 11: comp = companies.slice(100,109) break case 12: comp = companies.slice(110,119) break case 13: comp = companies.slice(120,129) break case 14: comp = companies.slice(130,139) break case 15: comp = companies.slice(140,159) break case 16: comp = companies.slice(150,159) break case 17: comp = companies.slice(160,169) break case 18: comp = companies.slice(170,179) break case 19: comp = companies.slice(180,189) break case 20: comp = companies.slice(190,199) break } setCompaniesToDisplay(comp) }, [currentPage]) return (
{companiesToDisplay.slice(0,10).map(c => { return })}
id Name Description Website
{c.id} {c.name} {c.description} {c.website}
...
{/*
    {companies.slice(0,10).map(c => { return

    {c.name}

    })}
*/}
); } export default App;
